attributes.action: Members of Parliament to pay back expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All MP`s to Pay back all expenses for furniture,bedding,food,home improvements and other non essential items concerned with they`re job for the period during which they were elected.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
